content:
PHASE 1 COMPLETE

All six core operations tasks completed successfully.

TASK RESULTS:
- 1-1 (storage): Repository pattern with 10+ functions, cycle-safe graph traversal
- 1-2 (causal): CausalPositionService with atomic sequence assignment, ActivityContext
- 1-3 (WRITE): POST endpoint with validation, causal position, placeholder integration_cost
- 1-4 (REVISE): PUT endpoint creating revision chain, preserves original
- 1-5 (READ): GET endpoint with revision history, references, content encoding
- 1-6 (server): Axum HTTP server with middleware, health check, graceful shutdown

FILES CREATED (Phase 1):
- crates/notebook-store/src/{repository.rs, queries.rs, causal.rs}
- crates/notebook-server/src/{main.rs, config.rs, state.rs, error.rs}
- crates/notebook-server/src/middleware/{mod.rs, request_id.rs}
- crates/notebook-server/src/routes/{mod.rs, health.rs, entries.rs}

TOTAL RUST FILES: 24

PLACEHOLDERS FOR PHASE 2:
- integration_cost returns zeros (entropy engine not yet built)
- Author extracted from placeholder (auth not yet implemented)
- Signatures are placeholder zeros

NOTEBOOK STATE:
- Total entries: 43
- Notebook entropy: 17.6
- No orphans, no broken references

NEXT: Phase 2 - Integration Cost Engine (entropy computation)
author: orchestrator
